segments.text: I notice the cookie jar is almost within the boy’s reach, and he’s stretching as far as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to collapse under him, but he doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, ready to catch whatever he drops, and it’s kind of adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at their determination to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely oblivious, which makes it even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before or if this is their first attempt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s balance is terrible, but he’s so focused on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall, but I also hope he gets the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, like this is the best moment of her life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear their little giggles and whispers as they work together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get away with it, and that makes me happy for them.
segments.speaker: PAR
